mapper.insert: INSERT INTO machine (machine_no, machine_name, machine_time, machine_status) VALUES (#{machineNo}, #{machineName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{machineStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT machine_no, machine_name, machine_time, machine_status FROM machine
mapper.update: UPDATE machine SET machine_status = #{machineStatus}, machine_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE machine_no = #{machineNo}
UPDATE machine SET machine_status = CASE WHEN machine_status = 1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END WHERE machine_no = #{machineNo}
